author: stakepool247
title: SPO Performance Monitoring Service
description: Stake Pool Operators lack live monitoring tools that would provide information about their Stake Pool Performance to them and delegators.
solution: Providing a professional Performance Monitoring solution to help SPOs and Delegators oversight and insights of Pools performance in realtime
experience: SPOCRA board member, Funded proposer, Stake Pool Operator, Stakepool as a Service Provider, SPOs mentor, elected Catalyst Circle member.
